ISSUE.TITLE: [feature]: Display Plane version on Planeweb Dashboard
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Is there an existing issue for this? - [X] I have searched the existing issues ### Summary When updating Plane, not possible to see on the dashboard if the version changed. We can add the version on the footer, something like that: ![image](https://github.com/makeplane/plane/assets/10955956/772294ac-4d90-4237-93f8-becbfa4a6bc5) ### Why should this be worked on? Need to know if our update is successfull.
